TopicTitle: Forum - how to disable hover popup?

Articles.Content:
I can't find a setting that will prevent popups like poster profile, thread info, and other stuff when you hover your mouse over a link on this forum.

I am thankful for the option to hide all the obnoxious signatures.  No one else is complaining so this is probably just my own personal issue, but I'd appreciate not having my view blocked because my mouse happened to settle on certain elements.

Sorry, I don't think the pop-ups can be disabled.

You can turn off signatures by clicking your name at upper right, then "Account Settings", then "Signature" and toggling " View signatures?".
There may not be a way to do this. @KasperVld?

No, the only way of doing this would be to block specific parts of Javascript, which a browser plugin such as Grease Monkey may be able to do, but it would require significant coding input from the user's end.
